name: 3.14 Door
description:
THIS GAME FOR ANDROID!

This game is under development, bugs and other unexpected features are possible. If you met bug, write about this.

Description: This simple 2d platformer. It tell us about the God of Doors, the small hero Pi (but his name never called) and the collective mind...

P.S. I apologize for the lack of English Subtitles, because i know English very bad.
